title: Utmost Support
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Ugh, this is so frustrating~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I know, I know, it’s frustrating. But there’s no point in getting hung up and crying about it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>I’m not crying...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Let’s just leave it at that, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ow... it hurts...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Hang in there. Keep the ice pack on it. You don’t want to make it an even more serious injury, okay, Ai?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>No way! I want it to heal up right now and practice more! I can take care of myself anyway!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>You really love to practice, don't you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>But you do too, Karin~ You’re always practicing this late.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Perhaps. Alright, it’s done. Try not to move it, okay? Once you’ve healed up, you can grind and practice more.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
